ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.editors

Interface APIBrowser.Collection

  • Enclosing class:
    APIBrowser

    public static interface APIBrowser.Collection
    A collection of documents that can be viewed in the browser.
    See Also:
    APIBrowser.registerCollection(ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.editors.APIBrowser.Collection)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      APIBrowser.Doc[] getDocs()
      Returns an array of the document descriptors in this collection.
      Object getHint(String name)
      Returns the value of a configuration hint.
      TextIndex getIndex()
      Returns an index for this collection.
      APIBrowser.IndexStatus getIndexStatus()
      Returns a value that indicates the level of availability of an index for the documents in this doc source.
      String toString()
      The toString method of a collection returns the name of the collection.

    • Method Detail

      • getDocs

        APIBrowser.Doc[] getDocs()
        Returns an array of the document descriptors in this collection.
        Returns:
        the documents in this collection

      • getHint

        Object getHint(String name)
        Returns the value of a configuration hint. Configuration hints allows a collection to return hints that modify its behaviour and appearance in the browser.
        Parameters:
        name - the hint name
        Returns:
        the value of the hint

      • getIndex

        TextIndex getIndex()
            throws IOException
        Returns an index for this collection. The result if called when getIndexStatus() returns any value other than APIBrowser.IndexStatus.AVAILABLE is undefined.
        Returns:
        an index that can be used to query this document source
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while loading the index

      • getIndexStatus

        APIBrowser.IndexStatus getIndexStatus()
        Returns a value that indicates the level of availability of an index for the documents in this doc source.
        Returns:
        extent to which a text index is available

      • toString

        String toString()
        The toString method of a collection returns the name of the collection.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        the collection name
